plot: Clark Manning, a fur trapper, is false accused of stealing pelts from other trapper's traps and sets out, with the aid of a Royal Canadian Mounted Policeman, Constanle 'Bones" Blair, to clear his name and find the true thief.
title: The Man from Montreal
plot_es: Clark Manning, a fur trapper, is false accused of stealing pelts from other trapper's traps and sets out, with the aid of a Royal Canadian Mounted Policeman, Constanle 'Bones" Blair, to clear his name and find the true thief.
plot_en: Clark Manning, a fur trapper, is false accused of stealing pelts from other trapper's traps and sets out, with the aid of a Royal Canadian Mounted Policeman, Constanle 'Bones" Blair, to clear his name and find the true thief.

cast.role: Myrna Montgomery aka Mrs. Myrna Rawlins
cast.name: Kay Sutton

cast.role: Ross Montgomery aka L. R. Rawlins
cast.name: Reed Hadley
